settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again.

logoutAlert.title: Logout
logoutAlert.message: Are you sure you want to logout? You'll need to sign in again to access your recipes.

deleteAlert.title: Delete my account
deleteAlert.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action will irreversibly delete all your data: your recipes, folders, shopping lists, and all information associated with your account. This action is irreversible and cannot be undone.

settings.subscriptionUnavailable: Subscription management is not available at the moment. Please try again later.
settings.subscriptionError: Unable to open subscription management. Please try again later.
